speakerBioSummary.text:
• Won the 10th season of NBC’s America's Got Talent          
  • First winner of the British TV series The Big Big Talent Show
  • Additional appearances include Talking Telephone Numbers, The Freddie Starr Show, Comic Relief, The Big Breakfast, Richard Digance Special and Give Your Mate a Break
  • Performed at the 21st anniversary gala of the Prince’s Trust

speakerBiography.text:
One of the world’s most in demand performers, ventriloquist Paul’s unique talents have seen him invited to perform for The Queen on The Royal Variety Show no less than 3 times, and rack up international TV appearances from Montreal’s prestigious Just For Laughs to ITV1’s Comedy Rocks.

His critically acclaimed live shows have seen him sell out theatres across the globe, and he makes his Las Vegas debut this autumn at the legendary Planet Hollywood.

With his hilarious ventriloquism, charm and impeccable comic timing, Paul’s live performances see him bring to life several very different characters including cheeky pre-adolescent Sam, belligerent OAP Albert and precocious infant Baby, as seen in his winning performance on NBC’s America’s Got Talent 2015, which has had millions of views on YouTube.

relatedSpeakers.name: James Corden
relatedSpeakers.speakerNameSubheading: Host, The Late Late Show with James Corden
